amendment.description: Amendment mandates the transfer of a secure gun storage or safety device with the transfer of any handgun and establishes liability criteria for damages resulting from the criminal or unlawful misuse of a handgun by a third party.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 6 and printed in part B of H. Rept. 106-186 to mandate the transfer of secure gun storage or safety device with the transfer of any handgun and establish liability criteria for damages resulting from the criminal or unlawful misuse of the hand gun by a third party.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (VA) amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 311 - 115 (Roll no. 236).
